Class MemberList

  • java.lang.Object
    • members.MemberList

  • public class MemberList
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents the list of all the Members. Contains all the Members of the library.
    Version:
    5/24
    Author:
    James Jian

      • addBorrowedItem

        public java.lang.String addBorrowedItem(java.lang.String ID,
                                        java.lang.String oldName,
                                        ItemTemplate item)
        Adds a borrowed item to a member
        Parameters:
        ID - ID number
        oldName - Name of member
        item - Item being borrowed
        Returns:
        A string stating that a member has reached the borrowing limit if they have 10 borrowed items, a String of the items borrowed by the member, an error message is returned if something is wrong

      • returned

        public java.lang.String returned(java.lang.String ID,
                                 java.lang.String name,
                                 ItemTemplate item)
        Returns an item a member borrowed
        Parameters:
        ID - ID number
        name - Name of member
        item - Item being returned
        Returns:
        A string stating that a member did not borrow that item, a String of the items borrowed by the member, an error message is returned if something is wrong

      • getMemberList

        returns the member list
        Returns:
        the Member List in arraylist

      • IDMatch

        public Member IDMatch(java.lang.String id)
        check if this id exists in the member list
        Parameters:
        id - ID to be checked in the list
        Returns:
        The first member in the member list that matches the given ID
